long_description: The REI Quantum Sling daypack has a dedicated pocket for a 14-in laptop and organizes other daily necessities. The single sling strap can be attached on either side for right- or left-handed users. REI Quantum Sling swings around to the front for easy access to the contents without removing the pack; zippered pocket on sling strap allows on-the-go access to small items. Dedicated rear-access laptop pocket is fully padded on all sides and fits up to a 14 in. laptop. Panel opening zipper provides easy access to contents. Fully featured front organizer pocket holds pens, electronics and small essentials; key clip. Front zip quick-access pocket holds small items. Cordura(R) nylon fabric offers superior abrasion resistance and tear strength; fabric is coated for water resistance and durability. Reflective trim enhances visibility in dusk/dark conditions; web loop holds blinky light (sold separately).
short_description: The REI Quantum Sling daypack has a dedicated pocket for a 14-in laptop and organizes other daily necessities. The single sling strap can be attached on either side for right- or left-handed users.
